summary.title: Summary
summary.text: Web developer with a passion for web technologies. I have over 3 years of professional experience and love solving problems with software solutions. I'm always willing to learn and highly motivated.

description: Increased stability of ad serving scripts and reduced bug tickets by 50%.
Extended internal debugger functionality to empower non technical personal to identify and fix publisher side ad serving problems.
Developed a tool to help trafficking team report campaign launch 66% faster.
Built PowerBI dashboards to help trafficking team monitor active ad campaigns.
Added batch statistics reporting to logging system to reduce publisher site load by 50%.
Developed dashboards to identify ad serving issues and reduce debugging time.
Lead development of Ads.txt management tool which increased the Yield teams productivity.
Developed CI/CD pipelines and development environments to increase developer productivity and increase deploy frequency.

education.title: Education
education.degree: B. S. of Computer Science and Informatics
education.school: Faculty of Computer and Information Science
